fixed_skill.desc:
Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 192.0%/201.6%/211.2% of Attack with a 75% chance to inflict Windswept.
If the target already has Windswept, reset effect duration and increase this skill's damage by 27.0%/28.4%/29.7%. Also, increase foes' Wind damage taken by 27.0%/28.4%/29.7% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Wind of Nirvana

innate_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Magarudyne

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase Attack by 15.7% for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Attack Master III

innate_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 43.5/45.7/47.8% of Attack, ignoring their defense.
innate_skill.name: Megidolaon

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. Increase Windswept accuracy by 13%. Increase damage to Windswept foes by 13%. When inflicting or resetting Windswept, decrease the target's Defense by 32% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Goodwill to All

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. Increase Windswept accuracy by 20%. Increase damage to Windswept foes by 13%. When inflicting or resetting Windswept, decrease the target's Defense by 32% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Goodwill to All I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. Increase Windswept accuracy by 20%. Increase damage to Windswept foes by 20%. When inflicting or resetting Windswept, decrease the target's Defense by 32% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Goodwill to All II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. Increase Windswept accuracy by 20%. Increase damage to Windswept foes by 20%. When inflicting or resetting Windswept, decrease the target's Defense by 48% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Goodwill to All III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
